00100     public static function authenticateUser( CPSFacebook $facebookApi, CPSFacebookUserIdentity $identity = null )
00101     {
00102         $_result = false;
00103         $_identity = ( null === $identity ? new CPSFacebookUserIdentity( $facebookApi, null ) : $identity );
00104 
00105         if ( $_identity->authenticate() && CUserIdentity::ERROR_NONE == $_identity->errorCode )
00106         {
00107             PS::_gu()->allowAutoLogin = false;
00108             PS::_gu()->login( $_identity, 0 );
00109 
00110             //  Set the current user value...
00111             if ( null === ( $_user = PS::_gs( 'currentUser' ) ) )
00112             {
00113                 $_me = $_identity->getMe();
00114                 PS::_gu()->setFBUserId( $_me['id'] );
00115 
00116                 if ( null !== ( $_user = User::model()->find( 'pform_user_id_text = :pform_user_id_text', array( ':pform_user_id_text' => $_me['id'] ) ) ) )
00117                 {
00118                     PS::_ss( 'currentUser', $_user );
00119                     PS::_ss( 'currentMe', $_me );
00120                 }
00121             }
00122 
00123             $_result = true;
00124         }
00125 
00126         return $_result;
00127     }

00132     protected function afterLogout()
00133     {
00134         if ( parent::afterLogout() )
00135         {
00136             $this->_me = null;
00137             PS::_ss( 'currentUser', $this->_user );
